backlog.request: Review performance implications of activity aggregation patterns

backlog.value: Ensures architecture can handle data volume at scale

backlog.request: Define API versioning strategy before implementation begins

backlog.value: Prevents breaking changes and ensures smooth API evolution

backlog.request: Monitor infrastructure costs as features are implemented
backlog.reason: Need to ensure we stay within $70/month budget target
